Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7500. I understand that the value of this product might be different to you, but I hope you'll find this offer compelling. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
